title: ASL 7.1 ‚Äî Health & Appointments (Clinic Dialogues + Symptoms) üè•
objectives: Ask/answer health questions using Y/N and WH forms
Localize symptoms on the body with clear placement and NMM for severity
Role-shift patient/provider to schedule/check in and describe basic concerns

vocab.def: Medical location signs; use as anchors.
SICK: middle fingers to forehead/stomach; HURT: index fingers twist toward each other at location.
Common symptom set (fever hand to forehead; cough at chest; cold sniffling).
WH set for details; brows down.
Mild = relaxed; medium = tight; strong = clenched + squint.
Patient ‚Üî provider with eye gaze to the other‚Äôs anchor.

sections.heading: Warm-Up: Symptom Placement + NMM

media.alt: Point maps: head, throat, chest, stomach
media.caption: Place PAIN where it occurs

sections.body: Practice **HURT** at **head/throat/chest/stomach**. Pair with **SEVERITY NMM** (mild ‚Üí strong). Keep touch precise, not vague.

microCheck.q: Best way to show strong pain at the throat:
options: HURT near chest with neutral face

sections.heading: Model: Check-In + Reason for Visit
sections.body:
Sequence:
‚Ä¢ **TODAY APPT I.**
‚Ä¢ **RS‚ÜíSTAFF:** **NAME? WHEN APPT?** (WH/Y-N as needed)
‚Ä¢ **RS‚ÜíPATIENT:** **NAME J-A-Y. TIME 2:30.**
‚Ä¢ **STAFF:** **REASON?**
‚Ä¢ **PATIENT:** **HURT THROAT 2-DAY. FEVER LITTLE.**

sections.heading: Questions Toolkit
sections.body:
Use short WH/Y-N forms:
‚Ä¢ **PAIN WHERE?**
‚Ä¢ **PAIN HOW-LONG?**
‚Ä¢ **FEVER?** (Y/N face)
Keep clauses **3‚Äì5 signs** with tiny pauses.

callouts.title: Time-First Helps
callouts.body: Lead with **TODAY / YESTERDAY / 2-DAY** to frame symptoms.

microCheck.q: Which NMM matches WH-questions like WHERE/HOW-LONG?

sections.heading: Partner Practice: Patient ‚Üî Provider
sections.body:
A = patient, B = provider. Build 4 lines:
1) **RS‚ÜíPATIENT:** **TODAY I SICK.**
2) **RS‚ÜíPROVIDER:** **PAIN WHERE? HOW-LONG?**
3) **RS‚ÜíPATIENT:** **HURT HEAD 3-DAY. COUGH.**
4) **RS‚ÜíPROVIDER:** **OK MEDICINE RECOMMEND. APPT FOLLOW-UP NEXT-WEEK.**
Return to neutral between RS lines.

sections.heading: Mini-Showcase
sections.body: Record **15‚Äì20s**: check-in + symptom summary. Include **time-first**, **1 WH question**, **1 severity NMM**, and **neutral return**. Example close: **APPT NEXT-WEEK CONFIRM.**
sections.teacherNote: Caption which symptom location you used and the severity level.
